00060 enum EStatTreeFlags
00061 {
00062     stNone      = 0,        
00063     stSortChildren  = 1,        
00064     stShowPercent   = 2,        
00067     stHideIfZero    = 4,        
00068     stSortByValue   = 8,        
00074     stCapChildren   = 16        
00075 
00081 };

00085     vtUnknown,
00086     vtString,
00087     vtInteger,
00088     vtFloat
00089 };

00116 class CStatTreeItemBase
00117 {
00118 public:
00119 
00120 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00121 
00127     CStatTreeItemBase(const wxString &label, unsigned flags = stNone)
00128         : m_label(label), m_parent(NULL), m_flags(flags), m_id(0),
00129         m_uniqueid(NewStatTreeItemId())
00130         {}
00131 #else
00132 
00137     CStatTreeItemBase(const wxString &label, uint32_t uniqueid)
00138         : m_label(label), m_uniqueid(uniqueid)
00139         {}
00140 
00146     CStatTreeItemBase(const CECTag *tag);
00147 #endif
00148 
00152     VIRTUAL ~CStatTreeItemBase();
00153 
00154 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00155 
00164     CStatTreeItemBase *AddChild(
00165         CStatTreeItemBase* child,
00166         uint32_t id = 0,
00167         bool skipOneLevel = false);
00168 #endif
00169 
00175     bool HasChildren() { wxMutexLocker lock(m_lock); return !m_children.empty(); }
00176 
00182     bool HasVisibleChildren();
00183 
00184 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00185 
00191     bool HasChildWithId(uint32_t id);
00192 
00198     CStatTreeItemBase *GetChildById(uint32_t id);
00199 
00207     StatTreeItemIterator GetFirstVisibleChild(uint32_t max_children);
00208 
00212     void GetNextVisibleChild(StatTreeItemIterator& it);
00213 
00214 #else /* CLIENT_GUI */
00215 
00223     StatTreeItemIterator GetFirstVisibleChild() { return m_children.begin(); }
00224 
00230     void GetNextVisibleChild(StatTreeItemIterator& it) { ++it; }
00231 
00232 #endif /* !CLIENT_GUI / CLIENT_GUI */
00233 
00237     bool IsAtEndOfList(StatTreeItemIterator& it) { return it == m_children.end(); }
00238 
00239 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00240 
00243     void ReSortChildren() { wxMutexLocker lock(m_lock); m_children.sort(ValueSort); }
00244 #endif
00245 
00246 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00247 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00248 
00251     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00252 #else
00253 
00256     const wxString& GetDisplayString() const { return m_label; }
00257 #endif /* !CLIENT_GUI / CLIENT_GUI */
00258 
00265     wxMutex& GetLock() { return m_lock; }
00266 
00270     uint32_t GetUniqueId() const { return m_uniqueid; }
00271 #endif /* !AMULE_DAEMON */
00272 
00276     VIRTUAL bool IsVisible() const { return true; }
00277 
00278 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00279 
00286     virtual CECTag *CreateECTag(uint32_t max_children);
00287 #endif
00288 
00289 protected:
00290 
00291 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00292 
00298     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag*) const {}
00299 #endif
00300 
00302     const wxString m_label;
00303 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00304 
00306     CStatTreeItemBase *m_parent;
00307 
00309     unsigned m_flags;
00310 #endif
00311 
00312 private:
00313 
00314 #ifndef CLIENT_GUI
00316     static bool ValueSort(const CStatTreeItemBase* a, const CStatTreeItemBase* b);
00317 
00319     uint32_t m_id;
00320 
00322     // (needed for the stCapChildren flag)
00323     uint32_t m_visible_counter;
00324 #endif
00325 
00327     uint32_t m_uniqueid;

00359 class CStatTreeItemSimple : public CStatTreeItemBase
00360 {
00361 public:
00362 
00368     CStatTreeItemSimple(
00369         const wxString &label,
00370         unsigned flags = stNone,
00371         enum EDisplayMode displaymode = dmDefault)
00372     :
00373     CStatTreeItemBase(label, flags),
00374     m_valuetype(vtUnknown),
00375     m_displaymode(displaymode)
00376     {
00377         SetValue((uint64_t)0);
00378     }
00379 
00383     void SetDisplayMode(enum EDisplayMode mode)
00384     {
00385         m_displaymode = mode;
00386     }
00387 
00393     void SetValue(uint64_t value)
00394     {
00395         m_valuetype = vtInteger;
00396         m_intvalue = value;
00397     }
00398 
00404     void SetValue(double value)
00405     {
00406         m_valuetype = vtFloat;
00407         m_floatvalue = value;
00408     }
00409 
00415     void SetValue(const wxString& value)
00416     {
00417         m_valuetype = vtString;
00418         m_stringvalue = value;
00419     }
00420 
00421 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00422 
00425     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00426 #endif
00427 
00431     virtual bool IsVisible() const;
00432 
00433 protected:
00441     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;
00442 
00444     enum EValueType m_valuetype;
00446     enum EDisplayMode m_displaymode;
00448     union
00449     {
00450         uint64_t m_intvalue;    
00451         double   m_floatvalue;  
00452     };
00453     wxString m_stringvalue; 
00454 };

00465 template<typename _Tp>
00466 class CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl : public CStatTreeItemBase
00467 {
00468 public:
00474     CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl(
00475         const wxString &label,
00476         unsigned flags = stNone)
00477     :
00478     CStatTreeItemBase(label, flags),
00479     m_value(0),
00480     m_displaymode(dmDefault) {}
00481 
00485     _Tp GetValue() const { return m_value; }
00486 
00490     operator _Tp() const { return m_value; }
00491 
00495     void SetValue(_Tp value) { m_value = value; }
00496 
00500     void operator=(_Tp value) { m_value = value; }
00501 
00505     void operator++() { ++m_value; }
00506 
00510     void operator--() { --m_value; }
00511 
00515     void operator+=(_Tp value) { m_value += value; }
00516 
00520     void operator-=(_Tp value) { m_value -= value; }
00521 
00525     void SetDisplayMode(enum EDisplayMode mode) { m_displaymode = mode; }
00526 
00527 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00528 
00531     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00532 #endif
00533 
00537     virtual bool IsVisible() const
00538     {
00539         return (m_flags & stHideIfZero) ? (m_value != 0) : true;
00540     }
00541 
00542 protected:
00550     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;
00551 
00553     _Tp m_value;
00554 
00556     enum EDisplayMode m_displaymode;
00557 };
00558 
00559 typedef CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl<uint64_t>  CStatTreeItemCounter;
00560 typedef CStatTreeItemCounterTmpl<uint32_t>  CStatTreeItemNativeCounter;

00646 class CStatTreeItemCounterMax : public CStatTreeItemBase
00647 {
00648 public:
00652     CStatTreeItemCounterMax(const wxString &label)
00653     :
00654     CStatTreeItemBase(label),
00655     m_value(0),
00656     m_max_value(0)
00657     {}
00658 
00662     void operator++()
00663     {
00664         if (++m_value > m_max_value) {
00665             m_max_value = m_value;
00666         }
00667     }
00668 
00672     void operator--() { --m_value; }
00673 
00677     uint32_t GetValue() { return m_value; }
00678 
00682     uint32_t GetMaxValue() { return m_max_value; }
00683 
00684 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00685 
00688     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00689 #endif
00690 
00691 protected:
00699     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;
00700 
00702     uint32_t m_value;
00703 
00705     uint32_t m_max_value;
00706 };

00712 class CStatTreeItemPackets : public CStatTreeItemBase
00713 {
00714     friend class CStatTreeItemPacketTotals;
00715 
00716 public:
00720     CStatTreeItemPackets(const wxString &label)
00721     :
00722     CStatTreeItemBase(label, stNone),
00723     m_packets(0),
00724     m_bytes(0) {}
00725 
00729     void operator+=(long size)
00730     {
00731         ++m_packets;
00732         m_bytes += size;
00733     }
00734 
00735 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00736 
00739     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00740 #endif
00741 
00742 protected:
00750     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;
00751 
00753     uint32_t m_packets;
00754 
00756     uint64_t m_bytes;
00757 };

00765 class CStatTreeItemPacketTotals : public CStatTreeItemPackets
00766 {
00767 public:
00771     CStatTreeItemPacketTotals(const wxString &label)
00772     :
00773     CStatTreeItemPackets(label) {}
00774 
00778     void AddPacketCounter(CStatTreeItemPackets* counter)
00779     {
00780         m_counters.push_back(counter);
00781     }
00782 
00783 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00784 
00787     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00788 #endif
00789 
00790 protected:
00798     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;

00801     std::vector<CStatTreeItemPackets*> m_counters;
00802 };

00808 class CStatTreeItemTimer : public CStatTreeItemBase
00809 {
00810 public:
00811 
00815     CStatTreeItemTimer(
00816         const wxString &label,
00817         unsigned flags = stNone)
00818     :
00819     CStatTreeItemBase(label, flags),
00820     m_value(0) {}
00821 
00825     void SetStartTime(uint64_t value) { m_value = value; }
00826 
00830     void StartTimer() { if (!m_value) m_value = GetTickCount64(); }
00831 
00835     void StopTimer() { m_value = 0; }
00836 
00840     bool IsRunning() const { return m_value != 0; }
00841 
00845     void ResetTimer() { m_value = GetTickCount64(); }
00846 
00850     uint64_t GetTimerValue() const
00851     {
00852         return m_value ? GetTickCount64() - m_value : 0;
00853     }
00854 
00858     operator uint64_t() const
00859     {
00860         return m_value ? GetTickCount64() - m_value : 0;
00861     }
00862 
00866     uint64_t GetTimerSeconds() const
00867     {
00868         return m_value ? (GetTickCount64() - m_value) / 1000 : 0;
00869     }
00870 
00874     uint64_t GetTimerStart() const { return m_value; }
00875 
00876 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
00877 
00880     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
00881 #endif
00882 
00886     virtual bool IsVisible() const
00887     {
00888         return (m_flags & stHideIfZero) ? m_value != 0 : true;
00889     }
00890 
00891 protected:
00899     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;
00900 
00902     uint64_t m_value;
00903 };

01104 class CStatTreeItemMaxConnLimitReached : public CStatTreeItemBase
01105 {
01106 public:
01110     CStatTreeItemMaxConnLimitReached(const wxString &label)
01111     :
01112     CStatTreeItemBase(label),
01113     m_count(0) {}
01114 
01118     void operator++()
01119     {
01120         ++m_count;
01121         m_time.SetToCurrent();
01122     }
01123 
01124 #ifndef AMULE_DAEMON
01125 
01132     virtual wxString GetDisplayString() const;
01133 #endif
01134 
01135 protected:
01143     virtual void AddECValues(CECTag *tag) const;
01144 
01146     uint32_t m_count;
01147 
01149     wxDateTime m_time;
01150 };
